about_the_game:
Command one of five powerful factions in a quick turn-based strategy RPG, where every choice shapes the fate of Thule. Explore and conquer randomly generated worlds, complete diverse missions, and forge your path to supremacy. Will you dominate this harsh land, or will it consume you?

GAMEPLAY

  • Free Game Mode: Play on randomly generated maps, where every playthrough offers a unique adventure.

  • Mission Mode: Engage in various challenges in different scenarios.

  • A Turn-based combat system, where the AI takes control of your Units.

  • Establish and expand your dominion with towns that harvest crucial resources for unit recruitment. Upgrade these settlements with a variety of buildings.

  • Venture beyond the borders of Thule to discover three additional planes, each with its own mysteries and challenges to overcome.

  • Explore the world with over 200 unique units.

FACTIONS

The Empire

The Empire of Thule was founded centuries ago by a powerful and divine being from the Celestial Realm.

The Empire’s goal became a crusade for human supremacy, aiming to rid Thule of its diverse inhabitants and create a unified, harmonious world for mankind.

Infernal Cult

Beelzebaal, a demonic overlord of unparalleled power and insatiable ambition, set his sights on Thule, a realm ripe for conquest and corruption. To realize his sinister vision, he dispatched his two most formidable demon commanders, Belfaz and Melina, to establish a foothold and spread his infernal influence.

The Infernal Cult quickly became a haven for society's most reviled elements. Criminals, dark mages, and those who harbored deep hatred for the Empire flocked to their banner.

Ironpeak Union

For centuries, the dwarven race has been entrenched in a relentless battle beneath the surface of the world. They waged wars against the countless horrors lurking in the shadowy depths of the earth. Yet through their resilience, mastery of stone, and undying resolve, the dwarves endured, forging an underground empire amid the endless conflicts and dangers.

The Ironpeak Union is a coalition of city-states and strongholds, a body composed of the most respected and powerful leaders from each of their towns. With the deep mostly secured, The Ironpeak Union turned their gaze upward, toward the surface of Thule.

Zyrrnoxi

The Zyrrnoxi are a terrifying and intelligent race, born from an ancient biomass that lurks in the dark, cold expanses of the ocean's depths.

Though spawned from the ocean's abyss, the Zyrrnoxi have evolved beyond mere sea creatures. Over centuries of conflict and adaptation, they have developed a complex and advanced civilization beneath the waves. They have vast underwater cities, constructed with bio-engineered materials and supported by an intricate economy.

Necrotic Conclave

A secretive society of necromancers who hail from an ancient race long lost to time. Banished for their forbidden pursuit of necromancy, they split from their kin and retreated to the frozen wastes of Thule. While their original race faded into obscurity, the necromancers, led by the powerful Melkor, used the mystical energies of the Ether to prolong their existence.

The four known realms

Thule

Thule is a dark and depressing realm, various races coexist amidst an unforgiving and dangerous landscape.

The lands are teeming with diverse and formidable wildlife, including wild animals and other beasts that add to the ever-present danger.

Many factions vie for dominance and control over the land, each driven by their own motivations and beliefs.

The Infernal Dominion

A realm steeped in eternal conflict. Demon legions engage in relentless warfare against one another, vying for dominance and control.

The Infernal Dominion is structured with a hierarchy of demon lords, each commanding their own legions of demonic followers. These demon lords hold dominion over different regions of the realm and maintain fortified strongholds, where they plot and scheme to expand their power and influence.

The current ruler is Beelzebaal.

Veil of Darkness

Veil of Darkness is a realm where shadows and illusions hold sway. It is a place where reality is distorted, and nothing is as it seems. Illusory landscapes, shifting mists, and mirages make navigation treacherous, leading travelers astray or luring them deeper into the realm's depths.

Scattered throughout the Veil of Darkness are the remnants of forgotten civilizations and mysterious ruins. These dilapidated structures hold remnants of lost knowledge and artifacts of immense power.

The Celestial Realm

The Celestial Realm stands as a beacon of virtuous ideals and moral excellence. It is a place where the purest manifestations of goodness, compassion, and selflessness are celebrated and embodied. Beings within this realm are enlightened, and they embody virtues such as wisdom and harmony.

It is protected by celestial guardians, ethereal beings of immense power and purity. While they remain dedicated to preserving harmony, they have a darker aspect to them. These guardians are obsessed with perfection within their realm and are unyielding in their pursuit of maintaining an immaculate order. They view any perceived flaw or disruption as a threat and are swift to take action to eliminate it.

(Trailer Music by Alexander Nakarada /
